metadata.name: ELEMiNT #1
metadata.description: Discover the unique and one-of-a-kind 3D sculptures by the visionary artist Verdandi. The Verdandi spheres are a combination of her signature MetaStyle from the ELEMiNTS Collection, and make for stunning virtual works of art. These sculptures are versatile and can be easily adjusted to fit into various virtual reality environments. Don't miss the opportunity to own digital art specifically designed for the Metaverse by an NFT pioneer, Verdandi.
